text: Phwk khea (mla xik ahˌ) klaw wa xo lut xey phwk rea pen thut khxng phracea khxng than phwk hela nan ca mi thung than di ley dangnan than cng deinthang pi nı wela klangkhun phrxm kab khrxbkhraw khxng than læa khn dı nı hmu phwk than xya di heliywhlang mxng wentæ phriya khxng than thæcring ca prasb kæ nang chen deiyw kab thi di prasb kæ phwk khea thæcring sayya khxng phwk khea khux wela chea wela chea nan kıl khea ma læw michı hrux
